document_title: Otitis media with effusion: Causes, symptoms and treatment
subsection_name: viem-tai-giua-u-dich.json_6_Complications of otitis media with effusion
subsection_content:
According to Dr. Huong, otitis media with effusion that is not treated well can easily become chronic. Long-term fluid retention and recurrent infections not only cause many serious complications in adults but also affect development and behavior in children.
Effects on children:
Delayed speech and language development; Poor learning; Reading disorder; Difficulty in education; Experiencing behavioral problems
General effects in both adults and children:
Deformed eardrum; Osteonecrosis of ossicles; Atrial fibrosis; Cholesterol granuloma, cholesteatoma; Sensorineural hearing loss
